He highlighted the collaborative and transparent nature of the Special Intensive Revision process, involving voters and party representatives.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ecs-credibility-cant-be-questioned-cecs-sharp-rebuttal-amid-vote-chori-row-key-quotes/articleshow/123345000.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ecs-credibility-cant-be-questioned-cecs-sharp-rebuttal-amid-vote-chori-row-key-quotes/articleshow/123345000.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 15:48:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="656809" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123344991,imgsize-656809.cms"/></item><item><title>NYC restaurant mass shooting: At least 3 dead, 8 injured as multiple gunmen open fire</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident in Brooklyn's Crown Heights, three individuals lost their lives and eight others sustained injuries after multiple gunmen unleashed gunfire inside a restaurant early Sunday morning. Responding to the scene, authorities discovered at least 36 shell casings, initiating an ongoing investigation to identify and apprehend the suspects.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/nyc-restaurant-mass-shooting-at-least-3-dead-8-injured-as-multiple-gunmen-open-fire-probe-on/articleshow/123346279.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/nyc-restaurant-mass-shooting-at-least-3-dead-8-injured-as-multiple-gunmen-open-fire-probe-on/articleshow/123346279.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 18:19:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="111556" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123346370,imgsize-111556.cms"/></item><item><title>'Laughable': Congress on EC's 'no ruling, oppn bias'; continues its 'EC-BJP' consensus attack</title><description><![CDATA[Congress has launched a scathing critique of the Election Commission of India, dismissing its claims of impartiality as "laughable." Jairam Ramesh accused the ECI of incompetence and partisanship, particularly regarding the Special Intensive Revision of Bihar's electoral rolls.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/laughable-congress-on-ecs-no-ruling-oppn-bias-continues-its-ec-bjp-consensus-attack/articleshow/123346162.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/laughable-congress-on-ecs-no-ruling-oppn-bias-continues-its-ec-bjp-consensus-attack/articleshow/123346162.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 17:56:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39366" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123346196,imgsize-39366.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft's new return to office plan: Company requires 3-day office attendance</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft is mandating a return to office for employees near its Redmond headquarters, requiring at least three days a week in-person starting January 2025. This shift aligns Microsoft with other tech giants like Amazon, Google and Meta, tightening remote work policies.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsofts-new-return-to-office-plan-three-day-office-attendance-or-employees-can/articleshow/123343413.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsofts-new-return-to-office-plan-three-day-office-attendance-or-employees-can/articleshow/123343413.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 12:32:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="92578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123343416,imgsize-92578.cms"/></item><item><title>Big EU huddle at Zelenskyy-Trump meet: Meloni, Macron, others to back Ukraine cause</title><description><![CDATA[Volodymyr Zelenskyy will meet Donald Trump with European leaders and Nato. Ursula von der Leyen and Giorgia Meloni will join him at the White House. Emmanuel Macron, Friedrich Merz, Mark Rutte, and Keir Starmer will also be present. This aims to prevent a US-Russia deal against Ukraine. It follows Trump's meeting with Vladimir Putin, excluding Zelenskyy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/zelenskyy-trump-meet-eu-leaders-to-join-ukrainian-president-to-support-kyiv-cause-list-includes-meloni-macron-among-others/articleshow/123345929.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/zelenskyy-trump-meet-eu-leaders-to-join-ukrainian-president-to-support-kyiv-cause-list-includes-meloni-macron-among-others/articleshow/123345929.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 17:26:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1422306" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123346177,imgsize-1422306.cms"/></item><item><title>No Babar, No Rizwan! Ex-cricketer backs Pakistan squad: 'This team can beat India'</title><description><![CDATA[Pakistan has announced a surprising 17-member squad for the upcoming triangular T20I series and Asia Cup 2025, notably excluding Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan. Led by Salman Ali Agha, the team emphasises aggressive batting. Director high-performance Aqib Javed confidently stated the team's capability to defeat India in the Asia Cup, despite political tensions and calls for boycotts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/no-babar-azam-no-mohammad-rizwan-aqib-javed-backs-pakistan-squad-this-team-can-beat-india-in-asia-cup/articleshow/123345377.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/no-babar-azam-no-mohammad-rizwan-aqib-javed-backs-pakistan-squad-this-team-can-beat-india-in-asia-cup/articleshow/123345377.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 16:38:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="141386" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345424,imgsize-141386.cms"/></item><item><title>'Don't push him towards early retirement': Manjrekar slammed for Bumrah comments</title><description><![CDATA[Aakash Chopra defends Jasprit Bumrah's selective Test appearances, countering Sanjay Manjrekar's criticism. Chopra emphasizes the necessity of bowler rotation in lengthy series, highlighting India's bowling depth showcased by Akash Deep and Prasidh Krishna. He argues for prioritizing Bumrah's longevity, recognizing his exceptional value to the team, even with limited Test participation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/dont-push-him-towards-early-retirement-sanjay-manjrekar-slammed-for-comments-on-jasprit-bumrah/articleshow/123346086.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/dont-push-him-towards-early-retirement-sanjay-manjrekar-slammed-for-comments-on-jasprit-bumrah/articleshow/123346086.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 18:03:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="47982" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123346274,imgsize-47982.cms"/></item><item><title>Apple's H-1B pay breakdown: How much iPhone maker pays engineers, designers & more</title><description><![CDATA[Apple, a tech giant with a market capitalization exceeding $3 trillion, is actively recruiting for numerous AI and machine learning positions. According to a federal filing, these roles offer substantial base salaries, with some positions reaching up to $468,500 for human interface designers. CEO Tim Cook emphasizes the company's commitment to hiring diverse talent and fostering a collaborative environment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/what-h-1b-visa-data-reveals-on-how-much-apple-pays-engineers-designers-and-for-other-tech-roles/articleshow/123343560.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/what-h-1b-visa-data-reveals-on-how-much-apple-pays-engineers-designers-and-for-other-tech-roles/articleshow/123343560.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 13:10:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="18676" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123343682,imgsize-18676.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: CCTV captures moment of firing at Elvish Yadav’s Gurgaon home</title><description><![CDATA[A shocking CCTV footage revealed two masked men firing over ten rounds outside YouTuber Elvish Yadav's Gurgaon residence. Gangsters Neeraj Faridpur and Bhau Ritolia, associated with the Himanshu Bhau gang, claimed responsibility, alleging Yadav promoted a betting app. Fortunately, no one was injured, and police have launched an investigation, analyzing CCTV evidence to apprehend the suspects.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/watch-cctv-captures-moment-of-firing-at-elvish-yadavs-gurgaon-home-gang-claims-responsibility/articleshow/123343838.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/watch-cctv-captures-moment-of-firing-at-elvish-yadavs-gurgaon-home-gang-claims-responsibility/articleshow/123343838.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 13:29:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1528142" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123343870,imgsize-1528142.cms"/></item><item><title>1,390 games! Fabio creates football history, equals Peter Shilton’s all-time record</title><description><![CDATA[Brazilian goalkeeper Fabio has equaled Peter Shilton's record for the most competitive appearances in men's football, marking his 1,390th game in Fluminense's victory over Fortaleza. The 44-year-old veteran expressed gratitude to his family and faith after the milestone. He is now set to surpass Shilton's record in the upcoming Copa Sudamericana match.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/1390-games-fabio-creates-football-history-equals-peter-shiltons-all-time-record/articleshow/123346413.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/1390-games-fabio-creates-football-history-equals-peter-shiltons-all-time-record/articleshow/123346413.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 18:29:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="42922" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123346437,imgsize-42922.cms"/></item><item><title>Patrick Mahomes on Chiefs training camp: 'You get to try stuff'</title><description><![CDATA[Patrick Mahomes concluded Chiefs training camp, energized by the team's youth and focused on self-improvement. He utilized scout team practices to experiment with trick plays and refine his throwing skills. Mahomes values the blend of young talent and veteran leadership, preparing the Chiefs for a challenging start to the NFL season with renewed determination.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/patrick-mahomes-reveals-why-scout-team-reps-are-his-favorite-part-of-kansas-city-chiefs-training-camp-you-get-to-try-stuff/articleshow/123345773.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/patrick-mahomes-reveals-why-scout-team-reps-are-his-favorite-part-of-kansas-city-chiefs-training-camp-you-get-to-try-stuff/articleshow/123345773.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 17:30:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43680" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345860,imgsize-43680.cms"/></item><item><title>‘82% stake sold’: Tesla exec offloads shares; Musk renews short seller threat</title><description><![CDATA[Tesla's Tom Zhu has sold over 82% of his Tesla shares since 2023. The sales occurred between 2023 and 2024. Elon Musk warned short sellers of potential losses if Tesla achieves full autonomy. Musk has clashed with Bill Gates over Gates' alleged short position against Tesla. This position reportedly cost Gates $1.5 billion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tesla-senior-vp-sells-82-shares-ceo-elon-musk-says-if-they-dont-they-will-be/articleshow/123330910.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tesla-senior-vp-sells-82-shares-ceo-elon-musk-says-if-they-dont-they-will-be/articleshow/123330910.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 12:48:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="400038" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330906,imgsize-400038.cms"/></item><item><title>Village near Nainital that turns into island in monsoon; traps residents for 3 months</title><description><![CDATA[Khuriakhatta, a village in Nainital, Uttarakhand, also known as 'Sri Lanka Tapu,' faces annual isolation due to monsoon floods, transforming it into a seasonal island. Villagers grapple with lack of electricity since 1984, a defunct primary school since 2011, and land erosion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhands-sri-lanka-tapu-village-near-nainital-that-turns-into-island-in-monsoon-traps-residents-for-3-months/articleshow/123341039.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhands-sri-lanka-tapu-village-near-nainital-that-turns-into-island-in-monsoon-traps-residents-for-3-months/articleshow/123341039.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 07:08:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SONALI MISHRA AND KALYAN DAS</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="82508" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123341060,imgsize-82508.cms"/></item><item><title>'My intent was to ...': Ashwin clears air on CSK’s Dewald Brevis signing row</title><description><![CDATA[R Ashwin has clarified his remarks regarding Dewald Brevis' mid-season signing by CSK, emphasising his focus was on Brevis' batting prowess, not the financial aspects of the deal. CSK affirmed the legitimacy of Brevis' signing as an injury replacement, stating it fully complied with IPL regulations. Ashwin lauded CSK's acquisition of Brevis, highlighting his exceptional batting form and potential impact.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/dewald-brevis-controversy-my-intent-was-to-ravichandran-ashwin-clears-air-on-csks-mid-season-ipl-signing-row/articleshow/123345805.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/dewald-brevis-controversy-my-intent-was-to-ravichandran-ashwin-clears-air-on-csks-mid-season-ipl-signing-row/articleshow/123345805.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 17:24:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33510" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345909,imgsize-33510.cms"/></item><item><title>'His legs are shackled': Ex-India batter on why Rahul is behind in Asia Cup race</title><description><![CDATA[Aakash Chopra believed that KL Rahul is still in contention for the Asia Cup, but his inconsistent approach is hindering his chances in India's T20I setup. Chopra highlighted Rahul's ability to dominate but noted his occasional slow starts and competition for top-order spots. To secure his place, Rahul needs to shed his conservative reputation and showcase his full potential.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/indias-squad-for-asia-cup-sometimes-his-legs-are-shackled-former-india-batter-explains-why-kl-rahul-is-behind-in-the-race/articleshow/123345096.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/indias-squad-for-asia-cup-sometimes-his-legs-are-shackled-former-india-batter-explains-why-kl-rahul-is-behind-in-the-race/articleshow/123345096.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 16:03:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="124690" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345108,imgsize-124690.cms"/></item><item><title>'Choro ko hataiye, hume jitaiye': Lalu Prasad Yadav accuses BJP of 'stealing' votes</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/choro-ko-hataiye-hume-jitaiye-lalu-prasad-yadav-accuses-bjp-of-stealing-votes-calls-for-opposition-unity-at-16-day-voter-adhikar-yatra/articleshow/123345574.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/choro-ko-hataiye-hume-jitaiye-lalu-prasad-yadav-accuses-bjp-of-stealing-votes-calls-for-opposition-unity-at-16-day-voter-adhikar-yatra/articleshow/123345574.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 16:48:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="959743" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345584,imgsize-959743.cms"/></item><item><title>Rahul Gandhi kicks off ‘Voter Adhikar Yatra’ in Bihar: 16 days, 1,300 km, 20 districts</title><description><![CDATA[Congress leader Rahul Gandhi initiated the 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar, a 16-day march spanning over 1,300 km across 20 districts, joined by RJD leaders Lalu Prasad Yadav and Tejashwi Yadav. The campaign protests the Election Commission's voter list revision, labeled as "vote chori" by the Congress.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-gandhi-kicks-off-voter-adhikar-yatra-in-bihar-16-days-1300-km-20-districts-full-route/articleshow/123344361.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-gandhi-kicks-off-voter-adhikar-yatra-in-bihar-16-days-1300-km-20-districts-full-route/articleshow/123344361.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 14:49:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="41500" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123344461,imgsize-41500.cms"/></item><item><title>'If we leave Tests to wealthy, it dies slow death': Ex-Australia pacer Johnson</title><description><![CDATA[Mitchell Johnson has disagreed with Cricket Australia CEO Todd Greenberg's statements. Greenberg believes not all countries need to play Test cricket. Johnson suggests a two-tier system for Test cricket. He says wealthy nations should help smaller cricket boards. Johnson believes limiting Test cricket to wealthy nations would hurt its future. He emphasizes that Test cricket needs more participating countries.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/if-we-leave-tests-to-wealthy-it-dies-a-slow-death-former-australia-pacer-mitchell-johnson/articleshow/123345296.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/if-we-leave-tests-to-wealthy-it-dies-a-slow-death-former-australia-pacer-mitchell-johnson/articleshow/123345296.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 16:32:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="133182" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345395,imgsize-133182.cms"/></item><item><title>'No ruling side or opposition for us': EC in first presser since Bihar SIR</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission refuted opposition claims of bias following the Bihar special intensive revision, emphasizing its impartiality towards all political parties. CEC Gyanesh Kumar addressed concerns about misinformation surrounding the revision, defending the transparency of the electoral process involving numerous personnel.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-ruling-side-or-opposition-for-us-ec-in-first-presser-since-bihar-sir-backs-exercise/articleshow/123344459.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-ruling-side-or-opposition-for-us-ec-in-first-presser-since-bihar-sir-backs-exercise/articleshow/123344459.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 15:23:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="679522" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123344694,imgsize-679522.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar shocker: Blinkit delivery boy shot dead in Patna</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident in Patna, a 25-year-old Blinkit delivery worker, Raj Krishna, was fatally shot near Saristabad turn on Sunday. He succumbed to his injuries while receiving treatment at PMCH. Police are investigating the incident, suggesting it followed an altercation between delivery workers. Authorities are probing whether a personal dispute or another motive led to the shooting.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/patna-delivery-worker-shot-dead-police-launch-investigation/articleshow/123344074.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/patna-delivery-worker-shot-dead-police-launch-investigation/articleshow/123344074.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 14:04:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52394" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123344084,imgsize-52394.cms"/></item><item><title>Dhoni to become India's head coach? Gambhir’s mixed results revive debate</title><description><![CDATA[Aakash Chopra believes MS Dhoni is unlikely to pursue coaching roles, citing the demanding nature of the job and Dhoni's desire to spend time with family after years of playing. Despite serving as a mentor in the past, Dhoni's continued playing career and the extensive commitment required for a full-time coaching position make it improbable.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ms-dhoni-to-become-team-indias-head-coach-gautam-gambhirs-mixed-results-revive-debate/articleshow/123344627.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ms-dhoni-to-become-team-indias-head-coach-gautam-gambhirs-mixed-results-revive-debate/articleshow/123344627.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 15:12:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39032" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123344665,imgsize-39032.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Netanyahu a problem’: Danish PM calls for EU sanctions over Gaza</title><description><![CDATA[Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen has criticized Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, labeling him a "problem in himself." Passersby rushed the injured man to Dhar District Hospital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/indore/broad-daylight-attack-man-stabbed-outside-house-in-madhya-pradesh-probe-underway/articleshow/123343699.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/indore/broad-daylight-attack-man-stabbed-outside-house-in-madhya-pradesh-probe-underway/articleshow/123343699.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 13:14:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJESH JAUHRI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="72828" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123343743,imgsize-72828.cms"/></item><item><title>PM Modi inaugurates Rs11,000-cr worth highway projects for Delhi-NCR</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated two significant highway projects in Delhi-NCR, totaling nearly Rs 11,000 crore. Task-masking involves doing micro-tasks to show effort without achieving real results. This behavior is linked to return-to-office pressures and surveillance. Telepressure from constant messaging leads to burnout.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/explained-the-rise-of-fake-productivity-at-work-how-employees-are-task-masking-to-look-busy/articleshow/123330440.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/explained-the-rise-of-fake-productivity-at-work-how-employees-are-task-masking-to-look-busy/articleshow/123330440.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 12:07:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="161547" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330453,imgsize-161547.cms"/></item><item><title>'Industrial-scale liar': BJP reacts after Gurkirat Dang denies voting multiple times</title><description><![CDATA[BJP IT Cell head Amit Malviya has strongly criticized Rahul Gandhi's claims of electoral irregularities, labeling him a liar after Gandhi alleged multiple voting instances. The BJP dismisses Gandhi's allegations as baseless and politically motivated.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/industrial-scale-liar-bjp-reacts-after-gurkirat-dang-denies-voting-multiple-times-vote-chori-row/articleshow/123342782.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/industrial-scale-liar-bjp-reacts-after-gurkirat-dang-denies-voting-multiple-times-vote-chori-row/articleshow/123342782.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 11:57:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="964496" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123343268,imgsize-964496.cms"/></item><item><title>E20 fuel rollout: Mileage dip, engine woes reported— what car owners have to say</title><description><![CDATA[The rollout of E20 fuel in India has sparked concerns among vehicle owners regarding fuel efficiency and performance. While the government touts economic and environmental benefits, experts emphasize the need for greater consumer awareness and OEM education to mitigate negative impacts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/e20-rollout-sparks-consumer-concerns-mileage-engine-woes-reported-what-car-owners-say-about-use-of-ethanol-blended-petrol/articleshow/123344239.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/e20-rollout-sparks-consumer-concerns-mileage-engine-woes-reported-what-car-owners-say-about-use-of-ethanol-blended-petrol/articleshow/123344239.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 14:29:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="91987" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123344300,imgsize-91987.cms"/></item><item><title>Man sends bomb to love interest’s husband in music speaker</title><description><![CDATA[Chhattisgarh police foiled a murder plot by arresting Vinay Verma, who sent an IED disguised as a music system to the husband of a woman he was obsessed with. Despite immediate medical attention, including CPR and defibrillation, he could not be revived. The club expressed deep condolences, acknowledging the emotional impact on staff and supporters. Despite the incident, the game continued, and the club later clarified the reasoning.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/tragedy-at-amex-brighton-fan-dies-after-collapsing-during-premier-league-opener-vs-fulham-but-match-continued/articleshow/123343848.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/tragedy-at-amex-brighton-fan-dies-after-collapsing-during-premier-league-opener-vs-fulham-but-match-continued/articleshow/123343848.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 13:38:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="132096" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123343850,imgsize-132096.cms"/></item><item><title>Asia Cup: Pakistan drop bombshell – Babar, Rizwan axed from 17-member squad</title><description><![CDATA[Pakistan cricket has announced its squad for the upcoming Asia Cup 2025 and the T20I tri-series in the UAE, surprisingly excluding Babar Azam and Mohammed Rizwan. Salman Ali Agha will captain the team, which includes a mix of experienced players like Fakhar Zaman and Shaheen Afridi, alongside promising youngsters.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/asia-cup-2025-pakistan-drop-bombshell-babar-azam-rizwan-axed-from-17-member-squad/articleshow/123343785.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/asia-cup-2025-pakistan-drop-bombshell-babar-azam-rizwan-axed-from-17-member-squad/articleshow/123343785.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 13:16:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="154410" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123343784,imgsize-154410.cms"/></item><item><title>Typical 90s cricket in Pakistan: When Basit Ali tried to outsmart everyone after being bowled – Watch</title><description><![CDATA[A resurfaced video shows former Pakistani batter Basit Ali's questionable sportsmanship during a match against Zimbabwe in the 90s, where he attempted to deceive the umpire after being dismissed. More recently, Ali has criticized the Pakistan cricket team and urged India to boycott the Asia Cup, predicting a severe defeat for Pakistan.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/typical-90s-cricket-in-pakistan-when-basit-ali-tried-to-outsmart-everyone-after-being-bowled-watch/articleshow/123343606.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/typical-90s-cricket-in-pakistan-when-basit-ali-tried-to-outsmart-everyone-after-being-bowled-watch/articleshow/123343606.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 13:01:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="12886" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123343665,imgsize-12886.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs PAK | ‘Afridi has eaten dog meat’ – Pathan recalls ugly war of words</title><description><![CDATA[Irfan Pathan has ignited the India-Pakistan rivalry with a candid recollection of his clashes with Shahid Afridi. Pathan revealed Afridi's controversial jibes, including a bizarre claim about eating dog meat, fueled his determination. He recounted a heated exchange during a 2006 flight, where he silenced Afridi's taunts with a sharp retort, asserting his verbal dominance over the former Pakistani captain.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ind-vs-pak-afridi-has-eaten-dog-meat-irfan-pathan-recalls-ugly-war-of-words-with-ex-pak-skipper/articleshow/123342811.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ind-vs-pak-afridi-has-eaten-dog-meat-irfan-pathan-recalls-ugly-war-of-words-with-ex-pak-skipper/articleshow/123342811.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 11:18:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="78462" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123342821,imgsize-78462.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[On average in India, a senior First Officer earns about ₹5 lakh a month.       <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[MakeMyTrip is leveraging artificial intelligence to change how Indians plan and book their holidays.       <description><![CDATA[Poly Medicure has revised its FY26 revenue growth guidance to around 16%, down from an earlier estimate of 20%, citing a weak June quarter impacted by slower performance in Europe.
